articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Fighter Pilots
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Fighter Pilots
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, called fighter pilots to the building of the WPK Central Committee to have a photo session with them.
					 The pilots were home on furlough by a special order of the Supreme Commander after creditably carrying out the first ordered combat flight drill for the new year.
					
					 The Supreme Commander had a talk with those pilots.
					
					 He noted that the reliable pilots could perform such praiseworthy feats as creditably implementing the Party's order for combat flight drill as they have always kept themselves on a high alert to glorify their life like a star in the spirit of suicide attack, the priceless mental asset.
					
					 They should continue to conduct flight drills in hard conditions so intensively that they can dash to the strongholds of aggressors like the blizzards of Mt. Paektu and inflict merciless strikes on them if they show any attempt of aggression, he stressed.
					
					 Saying that the sky over Songun Korea will be always clear and blue thanks to the Juche-based air force which has grown up into a death-defying corps, invincible force in the air, he had a photo session with the fighter pilots.
					
					 Being considerate of the pilots reluctant to leave him, the Supreme Commander had photos taken with them one by one again.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Servicepersons
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Servicepersons
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the participants in the meeting of military and political cadres for summing up the results of construction in 2014 and merited persons in the KPA who contributed to the construction of major projects.
					 At the venue of photo session, he gave a warm greeting to the participants in the meeting and servicepersons, noting that the KPA made positive contributions to building such monumental edifices in the Songun era by displaying the spirit of devotedly carrying out the Party's policies and the mettle of creating the Korean speed in 2014 as the January 8 Fishery Station, Wisong Scientists Dwelling District, May Day Stadium, workers' hostel of Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill and October 8 Factory.
					
					 He said that the meeting of military and political cadres for summing up the results of construction in 2014 marked an important occasion in reliably defending and adding luster to the exploits the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by leading the construction work and the Party's idea on Juche-oriented architecture and in giving full play again to the tremendous might of the KPA to perform another world-startling feats in the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 The meeting analyzed and reviewed the experience and lesson gained in last year's important construction projects and discussed the measures for successfully carrying out the construction task facing the KPA this year, he noted before having a photo session.
					
					 There is a saying that ten years are enough to change mountains and rivers, but our country works such miracles that one year is an epoch thanks to the heroic struggle of the KPA, he said, adding it is a great pride to have the KPA that is ready to go through fire and water to implement the Party's orders without fail.
					
					 Present at the photo session were Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol, Kim Jong Gwan and other commanding officers of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Tools Exhibition Arranged by Ministry of People's Armed Forces
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Tools Exhibition Arranged by Ministry of People's Armed Forces
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, toured an exhibition of utensils and tools arranged by the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces.
					 On display at the exhibition were 350 000 utensils and tools of more than 350 kinds, newly devised and manufactured or used by the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Saying that the exhibits are very spectacular, the Supreme Commander stressed the importance to prepare enough and various kinds of efficient utensils and tools and make an effective use of them in order to complete any labor-consuming construction project in a qualitative way in a fixed time under various conditions and circumstances. The utensils and tools are like a weapon to the soldier-builders, he added.
					
					 He underlined the need for the construction sector to steadily upgrade the utensils and tools so as to ensure the construction at a higher speed and more qualitatively with less manpower and materials while making work easy.
					
					 Now that our working class has had the experience of manufacturing various kinds of construction equipment and a solid industrial foundation was provided, it is quite possible to produce and supply advanced construction equipment and utensils and tools if they buckle down with a firm resolve, he said, urging the machine factories and construction units to conduct a vigorous drive for producing utensils and tools by their own efforts and newly devising them in a Korean way.
					
					  Then he looked round various kinds of building materials and fixtures and furniture produced at factories and enterprises under the KPA, such as toilet ware, different styles of concrete blocks, large tiles, iron and wire net fences, plastic tubes, benches and TV tables.
					
					 The displayed building materials, fixtures and furniture are rich in variety and high in quality, he said, stressing the need to strive to increase the ratio of localization of building materials according to the Party's policy.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the KPA would register greater success in the work to provide the utensils and tools badly needed for the construction projects.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol and Kim Jong Gwan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Vietnamese Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Vietnamese Party Leader
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, sent a congratulatory message to Nguyen Phu Trong, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, on Monday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend warm congratulations and greetings to you, and through you, to the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam and all the members of the party on the occasion of the 85th founding anniversary of the party.
					
					 Since its founding the Communist Party of Vietnam has opposed foreign forces' aggression and interference and led the struggle of the Vietnamese people for the cause of national liberation, the anti-U.S. resistance for national salvation, the reunification of the country and socialist construction.
					
					 We are rejoiced over the great successes made by the Vietnamese people in their struggle to build prosperous socialist Vietnam true to the intention of President Ho Chi Minh under the leadership of the Communist Party of Vietnam. 
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I express belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between our two parties and two peoples provided and cultivated by the preceding leaders of the two countries will grow stronger on the road of victory of the socialist cause, wholeheartedly wishing you good health and your party greater successes in its activities for implementing the decision of the 11th Party Congress.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends New Year Cards and Congratulatory Messages to Foreign Party and State Leaders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends New Year Cards and Congratulatory Messages to Foreign Party and State Leaders
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent New Year cards and congratulatory messages to foreign party and state leaders on the occasion of the New Year.
					 They included the president of the Russian Federation, president of the People's Republic of China who is general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba who doubles as president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of the Republic of Cuba, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, president of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic who doubles as general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, president of Mongolia, president of the People's Republic of Bangladesh, emir of the State of Kuwait, president of the State of Palestine who doubles as chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, presidents of Philippines, Cyprus, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, Montenegro, A
					
					 rmenia, Azerbaijan, Iran and Indonesia, captains regent of San Marino, president of Guinea, Nigerian president who doubles as commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces and presidents of Rwanda, DR Congo, Algeria, Angola, Uganda and Egypt.
					
					 Kim Jong Un also sent New Year cards and congratulatory messages to the vice-president of the People's Republic of China, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, UN secretary general, governor of the Khabarovsk Territory of the Russian Federation and mayor of Khabarovsk City.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Participants in Study Tour Group of School Youth and Children
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Participants in Study Tour Group of School Youth and Children
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un on Monday sent gifts to school youth and children from across the country making study tour along the course of the 250-mile journey for national liberation.
					 The study tour was sponsored to commemorate the 90th anniversary of the 250-mile journey for national liberation made by President Kim Il Sung and the 40th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's organizing of the march along the course.
					
					 A meeting for conveying the gifts took place on the spot.
					
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, officials concerned and members of the study tour group.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae in his speech said that the gifts sent by Kim Jong Un reflect his deep trust and strong hope that the participants in the study tour would deeply grasp the revolutionary history and immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il recorded in the revolutionary and historic 250-mile journey and carry forward it as the one of loyalty and a long journey of the Songun revolution.
					
					 He called on all members of the study tour group to cherish through the tour the unshakable faith to firmly believe in Kim Jong Un and follow him in any adversity and fully prepare themselves as a scouting party and reserves for the Songun revolution living in the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu, the spirit as strong as the blizzards on Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Congratulations to Italian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Italian President
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Sunday sent a congratulatory message to Sergio Mattarella upon his election as president of the Republic of Italy.
					 The message expressed belief that the relations between the two friendly countries would grow strong in the mutual interests, wishing the president of Italy successes in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Egyptian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Egyptian President
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of sympathy to Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, president of the Arab Republic of Egypt, on Sunday as regards a terrorist attack in northern Sinai, Egypt which caused many casualties.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy to the president, the people and bereaved families of Egypt.
					
					 Bitterly denouncing the terrorist attack as a base act of disturbing socio-political stability and national unity of Egypt, the message wished the president and the people of Egypt successes in their efforts to overcome sorrow and put the situation under control at an early date.

articles.title: Congratulations to Greek Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Greek Foreign Minister
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on Jan. 31 sent a congratulatory message to Nicos Kotzias upon his appointment as foreign minister of Greece.
					 The message expressed belief that the relations between the two countries would develop favorably in conformity with the common interests and desire of the two peoples, wishing him successes in his new job.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Foreign Diplomatic Envoys
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Foreign Diplomatic Envoys
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Recently DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong separately met and had conversations with diplomatic envoys of different countries here.
					 He met and conversed with German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials on Monday and met with the Syrian charge d'affaires a.i. here on January 29.
					
					 He also met and conversed with Swedish Ambassador Stiernlof Bo Torkel and other diplomatic envoys of European countries including Germany, the UK, Poland, Romania and France on January 28.
					
					 At meetings Ri referred to the dynamic drive of the army and people of the DPRK to carry out the important tasks set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his historic New Year address and the efforts of its government to implement tasks for Korea's reunification and carry out the foreign policy stands clarified in the New Year address.
					
					 Views were exchanged on the issues of boosting the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Cuba between the DPRK and Syria and some matters of mutual concern including an issue of developing the friendly relations with European countries.

articles.title: Syrian Issue Must Be Settled in Political and Peaceful Way Free from Foreign Interference: DPRK FM Spokesman
articles.content:
Syrian Issue Must Be Settled in Political and Peaceful Way Free from Foreign Interference: DPRK FM Spokesman
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Monday as regards the recent negotiations for the peaceful settlement of the civil war in Syria:
					 There took place negotiations for the settlement of the Syrian crisis between the representatives of the Syrian government and the anti-government forces in Moscow from Jan. 26 to 29.
					
					 At the negotiations both sides adopted 11-point "Moscow principle" the keynote of which is to defend the sovereignty and territorial integrity of Syria, jointly cope with terrorism and extremism and settle the crisis in a political and peaceful way.
					
					 The results of the negotiations showed the will of the government and people of Syria to ensure the sovereignty and territorial integrity of the country and find a political solution to the on-going crisis through dialogue.
					
					 Due to the undisguised interference in the internal affairs of Syria and encroachment upon its sovereignty by the U.S. and the West the civil war and bloodshed are going on in Syria, seriously threatening peace and security of the region and the world.
					
					 The DPRK government is consistent in its stand that the Syrian issue must be solved in a political and peaceful way by the efforts of the Syrian people free from foreign interference.
					
					 We hope that the Syrian government and people will put the earliest possible end to the crisis and achieve peace, stability and prosperity by their concerted efforts.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Visit Wonsan Shoes Factory
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Visit Wonsan Shoes Factory
						
 Wonsan, February 2 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials and officials of the party, Cabinet, ministries and national institutions visited the Wonsan Shoes Factory in Kangwon Province on Monday.
					 The factory has turned into a palace of the workers and the best factory to be proud of in the world under the loving care of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Prior to the visit they laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Wonsan City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Going round the monument to their revolutionary activities in the compound of the factory and the newly built room devoted to its history, the visitors grasped the undying feats they performed for developing it.
					
					 They went round various updated production processes of the factory.
					
					 Being briefed on them, the visitors clearly learned what is the modernization wanted by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 They were admired to see cultural and welfare facilities, outdoor sports facilities, resting places and the room for disseminating scientific and technological knowledge.

articles.title: DPRK Acrobatics Acclaimed at Monte Carlo
articles.content:
DPRK Acrobatics Acclaimed at Monte Carlo
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The physical acrobatics "Flying on the Twin Swing" and "Balancing Etude" presented by the DPRK National Circus won gold prizes at the 39th Monte Carlo International Circus Festival held in Monaco from Jan. 15 to 18.
					 The "Flying on the Twin Swing" with eight male and female acrobats involved includes such movements of high techniques as 15-meter flying, and double and treble somersaults.
					
					 The "Balancing Etude" is a fascinating combination of ballet, plastic acrobatics and balancing stunts on the ground and in the air.
					
					 Those physical acrobatics were awarded Gold Lion Prize at the 12th Wuqiao International Acrobatics Festival in Juche 98 (2009).

articles.title: Taedonggang Beer Boasting High Quality
articles.content:
Taedonggang Beer Boasting High Quality
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Dec. 15 medals for quality were awarded to the best home products some days ago. 
					 Among those products is Taedonggang beer, which has won high appraisal at different exhibitions and shows like the national exhibition of successes in quality control, beer show and Pyongyang Department Store No. 1 commodity exhibition.
					
					 It was also awarded ISO 9001 in October Juche 97 (2008) and HACCP in December 2010.
					
					 The beer is enjoying high popularity not only among local people but foreigners.

articles.title: Business Success in Store for Foreign Investors
articles.content:
Business Success in Store for Foreign Investors
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A project to set up economic development parks has been steadily pushed forward in different parts of the DPRK, drawing attention of many foreign investors, says Ri Sun Hak, a department director of the Ministry of External Economic Relations.
					 He said the DPRK government has made all its efforts to create a legal environment favorable for the rights and interests of foreign investors.
					
					 The government encourages them to invest in the country on the principle of equality and mutual benefits, he said, and continued:
					
					 A series of laws on foreign investment, including the DPRK Law on Foreign Investment and the Law on Economic Development Parks, has been newly enacted, amended and supplemented to provide foreign investors with legal guarantee. 
					
					 The DPRK government has already made the agreement on promotion and protection of mutual investment with 28 countries and agreement on prevention of double taxation with 13 countries in Asia, Africa and Europe.
					
					 Rules and detailed regulations have been adopted one after another to introduce internationally recognized investment formulas in keeping with the actual circumstances of the country.
					
					 Now the DPRK government has been carried forward the cooperation with Russian companies in the fields of railway transportation and harbor express service, while establishing economic development parks and paying deep attention to different projects of cooperation with other countries in the field of investment.
					
					 Tourism is also gaining momentum with the development of Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang and Mt. Chilbo areas into fashionable tourist attractions.

articles.title: Undying Feats Performed by Kim Jong Suk in Strengthening KPA
articles.content:
Undying Feats Performed by Kim Jong Suk in Strengthening KPA
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Sixty-seven years have passed after the foundation of the Korean People's Army as a regular armed force on February 8, Juche 37 (1948).
					 On this occasion, the people in the DPRK are recalling with deep emotion the undying feats performed by anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk in strengthening the KPA.
					
					 She devoted herself to implementing President Kim Il Sung's line of army building. She gave instructions in connection with the building of the regular revolutionary army for more than 420 times in her lifetime.
					
					 On February 23, Juche 35 (1946) when attending the opening ceremony of the Pyongyang Institute held in the presence of Kim Il Sung, she called on its officials to regard the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung as a guide in all their educational activities.
					
					 She paid primary attention to training military and political cadres and visited the institute on different occasions.
					
					 When the aviation class was organized in the institute, she explained to its officials the President's idea of founding the air corps and called for completing the airfield at an early date.
					
					 She also made efforts to strengthen the naval force of the country.
					
					 When looking round the first battleship built by the working class, she underscored the need to build more naval vessels for the strengthening of the naval force.
					
					 Her undying feats were also closely associated with various military affairs ranging from the organization of the first tank unit and air corps to the designing of military uniforms and colors.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Sinister Aims Sought by U.S. in Straining Situation on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Sinister Aims Sought by U.S. in Straining Situation on Korean Peninsula
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- When looking back upon the past history and seeing the reality, one can realize that the U.S. has disliked any process to improve the inter-Korean relations and run the whole gamut of evil acts to nip in the bud any sign of efforts to do so, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary.
					 What the U.S. wants is not peace and reunification but the escalation of tension and permanent division of the Korean peninsula, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 First of all, the U.S. seeks to justify its forces' presence in south Korea.
					
					 Because it regards south Korea as a springboard and bridgehead for provoking another Korean war.
					
					 If the north-south relations are mended, their story about "threat from the DPRK" will lose its justification. And in that case the U.S. will find it difficult to press the south Korean regime to cover greater share of upkeep for the U.S. forces present in south Korea and insist on their continued presence.
					
					 The U.S. also seeks to dominate Northeast Asia and other parts of Asia-Pacific.
					
					 There are several big powers around the Korean peninsula. They are steadily increasing their influence and expanding the sphere of forces in Northeast Asia and other parts of Asia-Pacific.
					
					 Much upset by this, Washington is massively beefing up its forces there to contain other big powers. It is citing "threat from the DPRK" for this arms build-up. 
					
					 The U.S. artificially divided the Korean peninsula and has craftily worked to freeze the split, throwing hurdles in the way of improving the north-south relations whenever there was a sign of any process to repair them. 
					
					 It is, indeed, a heinous harasser of reunification, wrecker of peace and sworn enemy of the Korean nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Denounces U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Denounces U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK  
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs on Jan. 29 denouncing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK. 
					 At the conference, the organization slammed the U.S. for blocking south-north dialogue and the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and, furthermore, seeking to lead the north to changes.
					
					 The U.S. has put military pressure upon the north so far and planned to develop the "tailored deterrence strategy", a preemptive offensive strategy, into an operational scenario, they noted, adding:
					
					 It desperately hurled its organizations into scattering leaflets by using the "human rights issue in the north" as a means for pressure.
					
					 Its hostile policy serves as an obstacle blocking up the south-north dialogue. It is an unbearable crime to throw a wet blanket over the atmosphere of mending the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The U.S. should cancel the projected Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills so that a climate may be created for south-north dialogue and a policy may not be pursued any longer for leading the north to changes.

articles.title: Abrogation of Fascist Law Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Abrogation of Fascist Law Demanded in S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on Jan. 29 calling for abrogating the "Security Law", according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo.
					 At the meeting speakers said that even foreign countries are calling for the repeal of the SL, terming it an evil law which suppresses ideology and conscience, meeting and association, freedom of academic study and artistic description. They went on:
					
					 Only when the prisons of this society which bind people's hands and feet by the fascist law are pulled down, is it possible to talk about reunification. The SL blocking the reunification should be abrogated at once.

articles.title: Sexual Abuses and Scandals Rampant within S. Korean Army
articles.content:
Sexual Abuses and Scandals Rampant within S. Korean Army
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Sexual abuses and scandals are breaking out within the south Korean army in an unbroken chain.
					 Sexual abuses are being ceaselessly committed by those in the upper echelon of the military, in particular.
					
					 South Korean CBS recently reported that an army colonel in Kangwon Province of south Korea was arrested for his habitual sexual abuses.
					
					 He has reportedly perpetrated sexual abuses against a service woman under his command several times since December last year.
					
					 Recalling a major of the same unit was also arrested for his sexual abuses, the broadcasting service said the army is floundering in the mire of sexual abuses and scams.
					
					 In October last year brass hats of the army were arrested one after another for committing sexual abuses, a strong shock to the south Korean society.
					
					 Women officers, distressed by such sexual abuses, are committing suicide.
					
					 90 percent of the women within the south Korean army has become targets of sexual maniacs of the military.
					
					 Various kinds of scandals perpetrated by those in the upper echelon of the military through munitions enterprises are baffling human imagination.
					
					 On Jan. 28 a former navy brass threw himself into the River Han to death. He had been under investigation on suspicion of having received hundreds of millions of won from a munitions business.
					
					 On Jan. 30 a lieutenant colonel of the air force was put in custody for a fraud in arms dealings.

articles.title: AAPSO Secretary General Demands U.S. Roll back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
AAPSO Secretary General Demands U.S. Roll back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Nouri Abdel Razzak Hussein, secretary general of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization (AAPSO), released a statement on Jan. 26 in demand of the U.S. switchover in its hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					 He referred to the fact that the DPRK was making sincere efforts to defuse the danger of war, ease the tension and create a peaceful climate on the Korean peninsula with a view to opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification this year marking the 70th anniversary of national liberation.
					
					 The large-scale war games ceaselessly held in south Korea every year are the root cause of escalating tension on the peninsula and bringing the danger of nuclear war to the Korean nation, he noted, urging the U.S. to desist from pursuing the anachronistic policy towards the DPRK and reckless acts of aggression, and boldly make a policy switch.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Myanmar, Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Myanmar, Nigeria
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- There took place in Myanmar and Nigeria on Jan. 27 a meeting, lectures and film shows on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venue of the meeting were photos dealing with feats performed by Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "The Tower of the Juche Idea".
					
					 The acting secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar said that Kim Jong Il was a prominent leader and father of the people who devoted all his life to the happiness of the people, the prosperity of the country, the world peace, security and independence.
					
					 The party will positively learn from the experience gained by the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in building an economic giant while firmly protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the country, and strive to boost the relations between the two parties, the acting secretary noted.
					
					 Ahmed Blaza Lawan, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics, referred to the Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il, adding:
					
					 The validity and vitality of Songun politics are being proved more clearly as the days go by.
					
					  It has become a trend of the times to learn from Songun politics.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the most experienced political elder who steered the world politics.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Kuwait
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Kuwait
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A Kuwaiti preparatory committee for marking leader Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary was formed on Jan. 27.
					 Javid Ahmad, administrative director of the Times Publishing House in Kuwait who is also chairman of the Kuwait Asian Journalist Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee set the celebration period from Jan. 27 to Feb. 18 and decided to give publicity to articles praising Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and arrange colorful political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Tajik Political Personage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Tajik Political Personage
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was a leader of the people who devoted all his life to the masses.
					 Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, said this in a statement on Jan. 27.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 He ceaselessly visited units of the Korean People's Army and different fields of the national economy for the security and happiness of the people.
					
					 Without taking care of his own health he worked day and night for the country and the people.
					
					 He was, indeed, a tender-hearted father who regarded it as the greatest happiness to devote himself to the people.
					
					 It is natural that the Korean people are highly praising him, longing for him.
					
					 Although he passed away, the feats performed by him for the country and the people will be immortal.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con pilotos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con pilotos
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, llamo a la sede del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea a los pilotos quienes estaban a punto de regresar a sus unidades despues de pasar las vacaciones de premio segun la orden especial del Comandante Supremo por haber cumplido con excelencia la primera orden de entrenamiento de combate de este ano y se fotografio junto con ellos..
					El Comandante Supremo charlo con los participantes en el entrenamiento de vuelo.
					
					Dijo que por vivir cada momento en el perfecto estado de movilizacion guardando profundamente el espiritu indomable, tesoro espiritual incambiable por nada, nuestros confiables pilotos pudieron alcanzar proezas enorgullecedoras en el cumplimiento de la orden de combate del Partido.
					
					En adelante tambien, deben hacer intensamente el entrenamiento de vuelo en las condiciones pesimas y arrasar sin piedad los nidos de agresion con el espiritu del viento cortante del Paektu si los enemigos se atreven a tocarnos, subrayo.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que gracias a nuestras fuerzas aereas autoctonas formadas como grupo de suicida, el cielo de Corea del Songun sera siempre claro y azul, y se fotografio junto con los pilotos.
					
					Se fotografio otra vez con cada uno de los pilotos al adivinar el alma de ellos que sentian penas de despedirse de el.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con cuadros militares y politicos y benemeritos del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con cuadros militares y politicos y benemeritos del EPC
						
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un se fotografio con los participantes en la reunion de los cuadros militares y politicos para el balance del estado de construccion del ano 2014 y los benemeritos del Ejercito Popular de Corea que hicieron aporte a la edificacion de objetos importantes.
					En el campo de filmacion, el saludo cordialmente a los participantes y los oficiales y soldados del EPC diciendo que en el ano 2014 tambien, el EPC hizo gran aporte a la construccion de creaciones monumentales de la epoca del Songun, inclusive la Empresa Pesquera 8 de Enero, el reparto de viviendas de cientificos Wisong, el Estadio Primero de Mayo, el albergue de la Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang y la Fabrica 8 de Octubre, haciendo uso del espiritu de materializacion a ultranza de las orientaciones del partido y del de creacion de la velocidad de Corea.
					
					La reunion de los cuadros militares y politicos por el balance de la construccion del ano 2014 marca un hito importante para mantener firmemente y glorificar las hazanas de los grandes hombres realizadas en la direccion sobre la construccion y la autoctona idea del Partido sobre la arquitectura y para hacer crear de nuevo las proezas sorprendentes para todo el mundo en la construccion de una patria prospera manifestando otra vez el poderio inagotable del EPC, apunto.
					
					Continuo que la reunion analizo y balanceo las experiencias y lecciones adquiridas en el proceso de construccion del ano pasado y debatio los remedios para alcanzar con exito la meta de construccion del EPC de este ano.
					
					Se fotografio con los participantes en la reunion y los benemeritos del EPC.
					
					Hay el refran que dice que en 10 anos se cambian hasta los rios y las montanas, pero gracias a la lucha heroica del EPC, se crean en nuestra patria los milagros que transforman lo todo en un ano, apunto.
					
					Prosiguio que es un gran orgullo tener al EPC que materializa incondicionalmente las ordenes del Partido en cualesquier circunstancias.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la filmacion Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol, Kim Jong Gwan y otros comandantes del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre exhibicion de herramientas de Ministerio de Fuerzas Armadas Populares
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre exhibicion de herramientas de Ministerio de Fuerzas Armadas Populares
						
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recorrio la exhibicion de herramientas del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.
					El Mariscal se puso satisfecho de que estan expuestas 350 mil herramientas de mas de 350 especies que el Ejercito Popular de Corea produjo nuevamente o equipa actualmente.
					
					Para terminar a tiempo y en lo cualitativo la obra constructiva que cuesta mucho en las variadas condiciones y ambientes, es importante  dotar con abundancia y usar eficazmente las herramientas de todo tipo y de buen rendimiento, dijo y continuo que las herramientas son las armas de combate para los constructores militares.
					
					Para construir mas rapida y cualitativamente, con facilidad y con pocas manos de obra y materiales hay que elevar constantemente el nivel de modernizacion de las herramientas, senalo.
					
					Ya que nuestros obreros tienen experiencias y hay la firme base industrial, ellos pueden producir cualquier equipo y herramienta para la  construccion si se deciden a hacerlo, menciono y prosiguio que las fabricas de maquinas y las unidades de construccion deben empenarse por inventar y producir nuevamente con sus propias  cuentas y a nuestro estilo
					
					Paso revista a los materiales, herrajes de construccion y los muebles de todo tipo, producidos en las fabricas y empresas del EPC, inclusive las lozas sanitarias, bloques, los azulejos de gran tamano, las cercas de hierro y las de malla metalica, los tubos plasticos, los bancos de parque y las mesas de TV.
					
					Elogio que los materiales, herrajes y muebles tienen muchas variedades y buena calidad e indico dinamizar la campana para elevar el porcentaje de materiales domesticos segun la orientacion del Partido.
					
					Kim Jong Un expreso la esperanza y conviccion que el EPC lograra mayores exitos en la solucion del problema de instrumentos y herramientas imprescindibles en las construcciones importantes.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol y Kim Jong Gwan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Nguyen Phu Trong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Nguyen Phu Trong
						
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, envio el dia 2 un mensaje de felicitacion al Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam, Nguyen Phu Trong.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Con motivo del aniversario 85 de la fundacion de PCV, extiendo calida felicitacion y cordial saludo a Vd. y por su conducto, al CC del PCV y a todos los militantes de esta organizacion.
					
					Desde el dia de su fundacion, el PCV viene dirigiendo hasta la fecha a la victoria la lucha del pueblo vietnamita por rechazar la agresion e intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras y llevar a feliz termino la causa de liberacion nacional, la resistencia antiyanqui de salvacion nacional, la unificacion del pais y la construccion socialista.
					
					Estoy contento de que bajo la direccion del PCV, el pueblo vietnamita logra grandes exitos en la lucha por construir un Vietnam socialista prospero en acato al proposito del Presidente Ho Chi Minh.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para expresar la seguridad de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas en el camino victorioso de la causa socialista las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre nuestros dos partidos y paises, preparadas y desarrolladas por los lideres antecesores de ambos paises.
					
					Deseo la buena salud de Vd. y hago sinceros votos por mayores exitos en las actividades del PCV por materializar la resolucion de su XI Congreso.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita a jefes de partido y Estado de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita a jefes de partido y Estado de varios paises
						
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ACNC) -- En ocasion del Ano Nuevo 104 (2015) de la Era Juche, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un remitio las tarjetas y mensajes de felicitacion a los jefes de partido y Estado de varios paises.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia regalo a participantes en caminata de mil ries para restauracion de patria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia regalo a participantes en caminata de mil ries para restauracion de patria
						
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 2 regalos a los integrantes del grupo nacional de ninos escolares por la caminata de mil ries para la restauracion de la patria.
					Tuvo lugar en el terreno la ceremonia de entrega de los regalos a los integrantes que realizan la Caminata de Mil Ries para la Restauracion con motivo del aniversario 90 de la misma hecha por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y del 40o aniversario de la apertura de la via de recorrido por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Jon Yong Nam, presidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, los funcionarios correspondientes y los participantes en la marcha.
					
					En el discurso de la ocasion, Choe dijo que estan reflejadas en los regalos la gran confianza y la esperanza del Mariscal de que los ninos escolares participantes asimilen profundamente la historia revolucionaria y las inmortales hazanas de los grandes generalisimos impregnadas en la caminata de mil ries de la revolucion y continuen esa caminata por la de fidelidad y de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					Destaco que a traves de la marcha los participantes deben guardar en sus corazones la ferrea voluntad de seguir fielmente solo al Mariscal aun en medio de las vicisitudes de toda indole y formarse como patrulla y reserva de la revolucion del Songun que vivan con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, el de viento cortante del Paektu.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX se entrevista con ACNC con el asunto de Siria
articles.content:
Portavoz de MINREX de RPDC condena maniobras de EE.UU.
						
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por la ACNC en relacion con que en estos dias EE.UU. trata de imputar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la responsabilidad de no poder realizar el dialogo EE.UU.-RPDC, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de RPDC respondio el dia primero como sigue:
					El delegado especial de Estados Unidos para la politica sobre el Norte de Corea, Kim Song dijo, en una rueda de prensa sostenida el 30 de enero durante su visita a China, que EE.UU. siempre tiene abierta la puerta de dialogo por la participacion y la desnuclearizacion.
					
					Esto es el absurdo intento para crear el ambiente de sanciones y presion por medio de la "cooperacion internacional" imputandonos la responsabilidad de no haber realizado el dialogo y la negociacion para la solucion del problema de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Como ya sabe todo el mundo, en el ano nuevo presentamos las propuestas generosas y  flexibles para eliminar el peligro de guerra, aliviar la tension y preparar el ambiente pacifico en la Peninsula Coreana e hicimos todos los esfuerzos sinceros para este fin.
					
					Ya aclaramos que tenemos ganas de tomar medidas de respuesta de cesar temporalmente el ensayo nuclear si EE.UU. paraliza temporalmente los ejercicios militares conjuntos en el Sur de Corea y sus alrededores y expusimos nuestra posicion de que estamos dispuestos a conversar en cualquier tiempo con EE.UU.
					
					E invitamos a Kim Song venir a Pyongyang porque el expreso la idea de encontrarse con nosotros durante su gira por Asia.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. da espalda a nuestra propuesta y solo intenta imputarnos la responsabilidad desviando la opinion publica como si no se lograran el dialogo y el contacto por nuestra actitud insincera.
					
					Kim Song repitio su posicion de que antes de empezar el dialogo debemos mostrar primero la actitud sincera por la desnuclearizacion, lo cual significa que quiere desarmar primero a su  contraparte, o sea  no quiere el dialogo.
					
					EE.UU. dice que esta dispuesto a la conversacion con nosotros mientras el presidente norteamericano habla abiertamente del derrumbe de nuestro regimen, lo cual es un disparate absurdo y el climax del cinismo y la hipocresia a estilo norteamericano.
					
					No tenemos la necesidad de conversar con la contraparte que niega totalmente la idea y el regimen optados por nuestro pueblo y solo trata de eliminarlos obstinadamente.
					
					Mientras EE.UU. niegue el cambio de su politica sobre la RPDC e intente el "derrumbe" de la RPDC, nosotros le enfrentaremos rotundamente.

articles.title: Portavoz de MINREX de RPDC condena maniobras de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX se entrevista con ACNC con el asunto de Siria
						
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ACNC) -- En exclusiva con la ACNC concedida el dia 2 en relacion con que tuvieron lugar recientemente las negociaciones por solucionar de manera pacifica la guerra civil en Siria, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea respondio como sigue:
					Del 26 al 29 de enero pasado, tuvieron lugar en Moscu las negociaciones para resolver la crisis de Siria entre los representantes del gobierno y de las fuerzas antigubernamentales de Siria.
					
					En la ocasion, ambas partes adoptaron el "Principio de Moscu" de 11 puntos, fundamentado en defender la soberania y la integridad territorial de Siria, hacer frente conjunto al terrorismo y al extremismo y solucionar la crisis de modo politico y pacifico, etc.
					
					El resultado de esa cita demostro la voluntad del gobierno y el pueblo sirios de preservar la soberania y la integridad territorial del pais y resolver la crisis actual por via politica y mediante el dialogo.
					
					Debido a la abierta intervencion en asuntos internos de Estados Unidos y el Occidente y sus atentados contra la soberania de Siria, persisten en este pais el conflicto armado y los derramamientos de sangre, lo cual amenaza seriamente la paz y la seguridad de la region y el resto del mundo.
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC mantiene la invariable posicion de que el problema de Siria debe ser solucionado de modo politico y pacifico con las fuerzas propias del pueblo sirio sin la injerencia extranjera.
					
					Deseamos que el gobierno y el pueblo de Siria logren la paz, la estabilidad y la prosperidad poniendo cuanto antes el punto final a la crisis con las fuerzas unidas.

articles.title: Cuadros del partido y el Estado visitan la Fabrica de Zapatos de Wonsan
articles.content:
Cuadros del partido y el Estado visitan la Fabrica de Zapatos de Wonsan
						
Wonsan, 2 de febrero (ACNC) -- Los cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado y los funcionarios del partido, el Consejo de Ministros, ministerios y organos centrales visitaron el dia 2 la Fabrica de Zapatos de Wonsan.
					Gracias a las medidas benevolas tomadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, la fabrica se ha remozado como el palacio de los obreros digno de jactarse al mundo y la perfecta en su interior y exterior.
					
					Antes de iniciar el recorrido, los visitantes rindieron homenaje postumo a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il luego de depositar el cesto y ramos de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce erguidas en la ciudad de Wonsan.
					
					A su paso por el monumento a la historia revolucionaria y la nueva sala de presentacion del historial, ellos volvieron a constatar las imborrables proezas de direccion de los Generalisimos para el desarrollo de la fabrica.
					
					Escuchando explicaciones sobre los procesos de produccion acondicionados excelentemente, conocieron cual es el nivel de modernizacion deseado por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Los visitantes se quedaron maravillados al ver las instalaciones de higiene, las deportivas al aire libre y la sala de divulgacion de conocimientos cientifico-tecnicos.
